main event: Ground radar detected a circular object larger than an aircraft emitting a reddish-orange glow in Cincinnati, Ohio, in June 1944.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 1 minute,The radar indicated the object moved in a circular pattern at approximately 600 mph,The object appeared to be hovering, but the radar showed otherwise, The object accelerated and disappeared from the radar,The sighting involved a large number of objects, totaling 1000.
